scripts.build.dev: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- build --configuration=dev
scripts.start.dev: npm run prebuild && ng serve --port=3000 --configuration=dev-serve --proxy-config proxy/dev.proxy.json
scripts.start.test: npm run prebuild && ng serve --port=3000 --configuration=test-serve --proxy-config proxy/test.proxy.json
scripts.start.prod: npm run prebuild && ng serve --port=3000 --configuration=prod-serve --proxy-config proxy/prod.proxy.json
scripts.start.local: npm run prebuild && ng serve --port=3000 --configuration=local --proxy-config proxy/local.proxy.json
scripts.start.dev.cheap: npm run prebuild && ng serve --port=3000 --configuration=dev-serve --eval-source-map=true --proxy-config proxy/dev.proxy.json
scripts.start.test.cheap: npm run prebuild && ng serve --port=3000 --configuration=test-serve --eval-source-map=true --proxy-config proxy/test.proxy.json
scripts.start.prod.cheap: npm run prebuild && ng serve --port=3000 --configuration=prod-serve --eval-source-map=true --proxy-config proxy/prod.proxy.json
scripts.start.local.cheap: npm run prebuild && ng serve --port=3000 --configuration=local --eval-source-map=true --proxy-config proxy/local.proxy.json
